header.heading: Bingham
header.subtitle: A free, friendly running and walking group I founded for all abilities. Every Sunday morning at 9am from Bingham Market Place.

intro.body: I founded the Bingham Sunday Running Club to get more people moving, socialising, and enjoying the outdoors. Whether you're a seasoned runner or just starting out, you'll fit right in. We're a group of friends who just happen to run together — no memberships, no bib numbers, just good vibes.
intro.body_2: Our route is lap-based, so you can do as many or as few laps as you like — there's absolutely no minimum distance. After the run, we head to Gilt for coffee and a full English breakfast. Honestly, it's the real reason most of us turn up.

what_to_expect.heading: What to Expect
what_to_expect.body: We meet every Sunday morning at 9am at Bingham Market Place. We do a gentle warm-up jog to the start of the loops, and then you pick your distance — small, medium, or long loop. There's always a mix of paces, so nobody gets left behind.
what_to_expect.body_2: No sign-up needed — just turn up, say hello, and join in. After the run, we walk back together and head to Gilt café for coffee, breakfast, and a good natter. It's super relaxed.

abilities.heading: For All Abilities
items: Mixed pace groups — nobody gets left behind
No pressure, no judgement, no sign-up required
Kids, dogs (on leads), and prams all welcome
Post-run coffee and breakfast at Gilt

social.heading: Stay Connected
social.body: Follow us on Instagram for route updates, photos, and weekly recaps. We also share tips for new runners and celebrate milestones together. Check out the Bingham Sunday Running Club website for full results, runner stats, upcoming events, and more.

cta.heading: See You Sunday!
cta.body: 9am, Bingham Market Place. Just turn up and say hello — no sign-up, no fees, just good company and fresh air. And breakfast afterwards.
